hadith.text: It was narrated from Muadhah Al-Adawiyyah that a woman asked 'Aishah:"Should a menstruating woman make up the prayers when she becomes pure?" she said: "Are youa Haruri? We used to menstruate at the time of the Messenger of Allah then we would become pure. He told us to make up the fast, but he did not tell us to make up the prayers
